data.name: IEEE Infrastructure Conference
data.description: IEEE Infrastructure Conference - April 29-30, 2020 - San Francsico, CA USA - Highly relevant and future-looking technical keynotes and panels will anchor the event. The keynotes will stimulate the thinking and create the foundation for the day.

relatedRecords.name: AllThingsRTC 2020
relatedRecords.description: The Agora AllThingsRTC 2020 event will take place at the Metreon City View in San Francisco on August 27. Submit to the AllThingsRTC 2020 Conference Call for Papers and become a recognized expert in Real-Time Communications (RTC).

relatedRecords.name: GDG DevFest Modesto & Berkeley
relatedRecords.description: Hey GDGers, we know October is a long ways out, but we’re super excited to bring you the first DevFest to be hosted in Modesto (and our second partnering with GDG Berkeley)! Location is TBD, but the date will be October 19, 2019 so mark your calendars now and get ready for a day full of awesome tech…
